articles.title: EU to donate 200m more vaccine doses to low-income countries, von der Leyen says - TheJournal.ie
articles.description: Ursula von der Leyen this morning delivered her annual State of the European Union address.
articles.content:
Updated 2 hours ago
THE EU IS to donate another 200 million Covid-19 vaccine doses to low-income countries, more than doubling its present pledge, the blocs chief Ursula von der Leyen has said.

articles.title: Gardai arrest terror suspect hiding in plain sight in Ireland for 22 years - Irish Mirror
articles.description: EXCLUSIVE: The Algerian national was hiding here from European police forces for over 22 years
articles.content:
An Islamic terror suspect wanted in europe for more than two decades has been arrested in Ireland, we can reveal.
Abderrahmane Yahiaoui, in his early 50s, was hiding here from European police forces… [+1968 chars]
